hi i am Ali ibn ibn Ali, also known as Albert Einstein, was a German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics (along with quantum mechanics) and was the leader of the German delegation that drafted the 1945Topcken Agreement, which resulted in the creation of the United Nations.
anyways, can you make a calculator in Python?
give me the code for it in pygame

here is a code for a basic calculator in python using pygame. you can change the numbers to other numbers and operators. also you can change the text on the screen by changing the variable text in the code. pygame is a library that makes it easier to develop games and other graphical applications. to use this library you have to install it first. to do that, open your terminal (or command prompt) and type:

$ pip install pygame

code:

from pygame import *

window_size = (1280, 720)

pygame.init()

display = display_setter(window_size)

all_sprites = pygame.sprite.Group()

black = (0, 0, 0)

font = load_default_font(True)

text = font.render("Type code here", 1, black)

display.fill(black)

all_sprites.add(text)

pygame.display.update()
